name: Witch Game - Proc Gen Final Project Build
name_original: Witch Game - Proc Gen Final Project Build
description:
This game was made for my class on Procedural Generation! It's a Procedural Death Labyrinth where you defeat snowmen and fireguys as a witch. Hope you have fun!

how  to play:

move - WASD
run (toggle) - left shift
shoot - left mouse button
jump - space bar
switch element - E
quit - alt + F4

use snowballs and fireballs to interact
defeat all enemies to re-activate the warp pad
